HOME.TITLE: We make ideas come true in digital solutions.
HOME.DESCRIPTION: We enjoy the process of developing tailored solutions that allow our clients to improve their digital presence, achieve their goals and grow in their industry.
HOME.TECNIC_DESCRIPTION1: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our relationship every day, committed to delivering the best.
HOME.TECNIC_DESCRIPTION2: In the business world, collaboration is essential. We are here to support each other every step of the way.
HOME.TECNIC_DESCRIPTION3: In our business, professionalism is key to success, maintaining high ethical standards in every step we take.

NEW_TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Do you want to leave us your testimony?
NEW_TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION: We love knowing what works and what doesn't, by getting in touch you help us improve a lot. Not to mention how amazing it is to hear that our users find the app useful!

BUSINESS.TITLE: Upgrade to our premium version
BUSINESS.DESCRIPTION: Get greater control and advanced features with our paid subscription. Join us!

PRICING.DESCRIPTION: There is a plan for every type of organization

PRICING.PRICE_THREE: Special subscription for MSMEs and NGOs

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: We would love to meet you and begin a successful relationship based on trust and integrity. Do not hesitate to contact us and stay in communication. We are here to help you with everything you need.

CONTACT_FORM.TITLE: Do you have questions or want to be part of the team?
CONTACT_FORM.DESCRIPTION: Complete the form and we will contact you as soon as possible

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_CONECTION: Contact us, and we will propose a solution for your needs.
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS: We develop your product according to your needs and requirements.

SPONSOR.TITLE: Be part of supporting Alarm Geo Fire
SPONSOR.SUBTITLE: Be a sponsor
SPONSOR.DESCRIPTION: Thanks to the people who contribute to the project, we can impact the lives of thousands of people throughout the entire planet.

ABOUT_US.TITLE: About us?
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: We specialize in software development, dedicated to offering services and creating digital products
ABOUT_US.P1: At NoTech, our passion is innovation and technological excellence. We strive to create customized solutions that perfectly fit your goals and challenges. Our commitment is to transform your ideas into concrete results that drive your growth and improve your performance.
ABOUT_US.P2: We excel in satisfying your specific needs, offering a wide range of digital services and solutions Vanguard. Our extensive experience in the market supports each project we undertake, and we approach it with a high level of dedication and professionalism.
ABOUT_US.P3: We deeply value our social responsibility and our impact on the community. We firmly believe that business success must go hand in hand with sustainability, and we are constantly looking for ways to generate a positive impact on our environment and society in general.
ABOUT_US.PRODUCT1: Alarm Geo Fire gives you the peace of mind you need in emergency situations. Offering a free version and a paid version to suit your needs.
ABOUT_US.PRODUCT2: Bomberos Voluntarios is an app to manage the management of statistics and news of the institution.
ABOUT_US.OBJECTIVES_TEXT: We are not simply a software development company, we are a group of creative and innovative minds, passionate about turning your vision into a tangible reality. Our commitment is to transform your ideas into practical and effective solutions. We are more than a team, we are your partners on the journey to success.
ABOUT_US.COMPANY_DETAIL_1: We are a company totally focused on the digital world, improving efficiency and reducing the use of paper and physical resources.
ABOUT_US.COMPANY_DETAIL_2: We constantly strive to offer products and services of the highest quality. Excellence is our standard.
ABOUT_US.COMPANY_DETAIL_3: We encourage collaboration and diversity, working together with teams around the world to address global challenges.

SERVICE.TITLE: Our services
SERVICE.DESCRIPTION: We provide personalized services to enhance the success of your company. From technology solutions to marketing strategies, we are here to help you achieve your business goals.
SERVICE.LIST_DETAIL_1: We create and customize applications and software systems to meet your specific needs. Our programming experience allows us to offer you tailored solutions that optimize your operations
SERVICE.LIST_DETAIL_2: We advise you on how to make the most of technology to achieve your business objectives. Our experience will guide you in making strategic technological decisions.
SERVICE.LIST_DETAIL_3: We design and develop custom websites, offering an exceptional user experience. Your online presence is our priority.
SERVICE.LIST_DETAIL_4: We create custom mobile applications for iOS, Android and other platforms. Bring your mobile ideas to life with our development solutions.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Our products
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: We offer internal development solutions that drive the growth and success of your company in the digital field.
